Description: Returns data about an allergy or intolerance to a specific substance associated with one patient.
SampleResponse:
<AllergyIntolerance xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="eRdvh3-3tt.GJ8j6lHXb3Cw3"/>

<clinicalStatus value="active"/>

<verificationStatus value="confirmed"/>

<category value="medication"/>

<assertedDate value="2018-01-08"/>

<code>

<text value="DUCKWEED [LEMNA]"/>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.6.88"/>

<code value="1333267"/>

<display value="DUCKWEED [LEMNA]"/>

</coding>

<coding>

<system value="2.16.840.1.113883.4.9"/>

<code value="621HHM46SV"/>

</coding>

</code>

<patient>

<reference value="https://hostname/instance/api/FHIR/STU3/Patient/eXNw1Jri7IJSdF74g729EUw3"/>

<display value="Jjs, Allergies"/>

</patient>

<note>

<text value="Patient has experienced anaphylaxis from previous exposure to duckweed."/>

</note>

<reaction>

<description value="Anaphylaxis"/>

<severity value="moderate"/>

<manifestation>

<text value="Anaphylaxis"/>

</manifestation>

</reaction>

</AllergyIntolerance>

assertedDate.Name: assertedDate
assertedDate.Description: The date the allergy was recorded in Epic.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
The category of the allergy.

The following default values are supported, but additional values may be configured by each Epic organization:

  • food
  • medication
  • environment
  • biologic

Starting in the May 2021 version of Epic, multiple category values can be returned in this element.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description:
The current status of the allergy. Possible values include:
•	active
•	resolved
•	inactive

Starting in the February 2022 version of Epic, or in the November 2021 version by special update, if no known allergies on file, value will be "active". In earlier versions of Epic, this element is not returned if no known allergies are on file.

criticality.Name: criticality
criticality.Description: Refers to the risk of clinical harm of a reaction to the substance.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-AllergyIntolerance

note.Name: note
note.Description: Any comments associated with the allergy.

onsetPeriod.Name: onsetPeriod
onsetPeriod.Description: If an allergy has a noted date or a resolved date, those dates are specified here.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource for whom the allergy is relevant.

reaction.Name: reaction
reaction.Description: List of known reactions the patient had to the substance.

manifestation.Name: manifestation
manifestation.Description: A single reaction the patient had to the substance.

severity.Name: severity
severity.Description:
The degree of the patient's reaction. Possible values are:

  • mild
  • moderate
  • severe

verificationStatus.Name: verificationStatus
verificationStatus.Description: If the allergy is on the patient's chart, this element specifies "confirmed". If it is a newly created allergy and and still needs to be reconciled, it is "unconfirmed".
